experience.title: Content Manager
experience.description: If you want to see the change in a particular area then get involved in with the change makers. Involve focusing on changing the way of learning and making study interesting. This situation is with most of the parent that they don't focus on their children basics and pay lacs of rupees on their higher education and still not get results and there are lots of students who focus on learning Chapters and getting good grades. In India, 47% of youth is unemployable because they are not able to touch the mark of companies. So, the question is what today's companies want from the youth. The answer is hidden in this word " Automation". Yes, The Automation is developing day by day and giving us hand in labor work. Using my assuming power, in 20 years we will see Self-driving cars and Robots securing the places. In Chennai, one restaurant hired robots as waiters and robots are serving foods this makes me reduce my assumed years but let it be. That means now these companies are focusing on soft skills and emotional intelligence. We at Involve focuses on developing  soft skills to bring future Leaders and Improve basic undersstanding.

experience.title: Cadet
experience.description: Being a Cadet of NCC I learnt to be in discipline and being well mannered in personality, and I become punctual. NCC always focuses on team building, how can we increase our growth rapidly if we have a great team and great team comes from a great leader so, in NCC I learned about how a great leader behave and what is his duty. Being in NCC is the best and learning experience of my life
